attributes.action: Enact legislation to debar MPs representing Scottish constituencies who are elected to the Westminster Parliament from government/cabinet appointments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Under current arrangements MPs representing Scottish constituencies who are elected to the Westminster Parliament can vote on matters affecting England only and are, thus,  not accountable to their own unaffected electorate. 

Far worse than this, such MPs are currently appointed to government and cabinet posts disproportionately influencing and shaping policy for England. This is antidemocratic and unjust

Mr Blair Please enact legislation to debar MPs representing Scottish constituencies who are elected to the Westminster Parliament from government/cabinet appointments.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
